entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kugaaruk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:19 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -37.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kugaaruk Airport 3:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
Condition: Haze
Temperature: -37.9°C

Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -53
Dewpoint: -42.4°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 46.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 46. Wind chill minus 49 this evening and minus 56 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 43. Wind chill near minus 59. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
